archimate:Requirement.name: PE.2.1.3c: c) types of individual operating in the local environment (e.g. regular users, operational staff, individuals with special access privileges and external parties such as contractors)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
